name: Synthetic Soul: Neon
description:
Synthetic Soul: Neon is an immersive modern life sim with an in-depth robot companion.

This idea allows you to play the game your way, with the player choice being our guiding gameplay mechanic.

After uncovering a destroyed pool house suite, you discover a prototype Greydoll, the earliest of its kind, set up shop, and use the location as a new base of operations for scavenging, all to get enough money to escape poverty.

You can purchase new outfits and personality modules for your robot, Real Estate, and Commercial Real Estate.

Earn money daily from scavenging investments, stock trading, or Real Estate Income.

What kind of person will you become once you achieve your freedom?

Discover the past and change your future.
